 
===> 150/1/0rir.raku <===
Input:  $a = '1234', $b = '5678'
Output: 7 

Fibonacci Words:

'1234'
'5678'
'12345678'
'567812345678'
'12345678567812345678'
'56781234567812345678567812345678'
'1234567856781234567856781234567812345678567812345678'

         The   53  digit   in  the  first   term  having   at  least  51  digits
'1234567856781234567856781234567812345678567812345678' is 7.
 
===> 150/1/2colours.raku <===
The 51st digit in the first term having at least 51 digits '1234567856781234567856781234567812345678567812345678' is 7.
 
===> 150/1/ash.raku <===
The 51st digit in the first term having at least 51 digits '1234567856781234567856781234567812345678567812345678' is 7.
 
===> 150/1/athanasius.raku <===

Challenge 150, Task #1: Fibonacci Words (Raku)

Input:  $a = '1234' $b = '5678'
Output: 7
 
===> 150/1/bruce-gray.raku <===
1..1
ok 1 - 51st char of Fib_substr(1234 5678) is "7"
 
===> 150/1/laurent-rosenfeld.raku <===
7
 
===> 150/1/luca-ferrari.raku <===
7
1234
5678
12345678
567812345678
12345678567812345678
56781234567812345678567812345678
1234567856781234567856781234567812345678567812345678

'5678'

'567812345678'

'56781234567812345678567812345678'
'1234567856781234567856781234567812345678567812345678'

51st digit is 7
